amendment.description: Amendment deletes language that placed a cap on the number of participants in the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) at 7.3 million people.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed in the Congressional Record of July 13, as amendment No. 18, to delete the provisions in the bill that caps the number of participants in the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) at 7.3 million people.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall (OH) amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 145 (Roll no. 543).
